page.title: 14The Parish Council,S.Wootton
page.content: South Wootton parish council consists of 13 elected members who employ a part-time clerk and a gardener/odd job man.The main concerns of the council are:-{public lighting, {footpaths,the common}(which has been considerably tidied up in the last decade),{a cemetery and surrounding {community area}(upon which is built a village hall),{17acres recreational {land}(jointly leased and developed with the neighbouring parish council of North Wootton),{allotments,new {buildings and other developments.} In addition the council acts on behalf of parishioners on matters normally dealt with by the county council.There is a recently built store which houses records and equipment(including a ride-on mower).Meetings are held every 6 weeks and there are 2 meetings a yr. { }
